DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Required : AZT , d4T , ddI , ddC . Antipneumocystis prophylaxis . Allowed : Short course ( < 14 day ) ciprofloxacin acute infection . Patients must : AIDS . CD4 count < = 100 cells/mm3 . NO prior current MAC infection . Prior Medication : Required : Antipneumocystis prophylaxis least 4 week prior study entry . Allowed : Prior rifabutin . Prior ethambutol . Prior clarithromycin . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Positive tuberculin skin test ( PPD > 5 mm ) . Active M. tuberculosis . Perceived unreliable unavailable frequent monitoring . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Other antiretrovirals specifically allow . All investigational drug . Other antimycobacterial therapy , clarithromycin , azithromycin , rifampin , clofazimine , amikacin , streptomycin , isoniazid , cycloserine , ethionamide , ciprofloxacin ( > = 14 day ) . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Known hypersensitivity rifabutin , rifampin , rifamycins and/or ethambutol . Prior Medication : Excluded within 4 week prior study entry : Rifampin .
